title: Many natural World Heritage sites threatened by oil, mining: report
text:
Published By: Reuters - Environment - Today 
LONDON (Reuters) - Almost a third of natural World Heritage sites are threatened by mining and oil exploration, according to a report that s... Read Full Story ... Related articles:
